import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from "react" import "./TweetList.css" import { connect } from "react-redux" import moment from "moment" import { tweetActions } from "../../action/tweet" import AuthContext from "../../util/AuthContext" import InfiniteScroll from "react-infinite-scroll-component" import CommentForm from "./CommentForm" function TweetList(props) { const [tweetList, setTweetList] = useState([]) const [likeCounter, setLikeCounter] = useState() const [page, setPage] = useState(1) const { currentUser } = useContext(AuthContext) const [showCommentForm, setShowCommentForm] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { const onLoadTweetList = () => { setTweetList(props.tweet_payload) } onLoadTweetList() }, [props.tweet_payload]) const handleLikeCounter = (tweet_id) => { const data = tweetList.filter((list) => list._id === tweet_id) setLikeCounter(data[0].likes + 1) const payload = { likes: likeCounter, _id: tweet_id, } props.dispatch(tweetActions.likeTweet(payload)) } const handleRemoveTweet = (id) => { try { props.dispatch(tweetActions.removeTweet(id)) } catch (error) { console.log(error.message) } } const handleComment = (id) => { setShowCommentForm(!showCommentForm) console.log(showCommentForm) } const fetchMoreData = () => { console.log(props.dispatch(tweetActions.getAllTweet(page))) setTweetList(props.tweet_payload) setPage((prev) => prev + 1) } useEffect(() => { fetchMoreData() }, []) return (
    Loading...} scrollableTarget="scrollable" > {tweetList .map((tweet, index) => (
  • {tweet.username}
    {moment( tweet.date_tweeted ).fromNow()}
    {currentUser._id === tweet.user_id ? (
    ) : ( "" )}

    {tweet.tweet_body}

    {tweet.likes}{" "} like(s)
    { tweet.comments .length }{" "} comments
    Retweet
    • )) .reverse()}
    {showCommentForm ? :
    }
) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { tweet_payload: state.tweets, } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(TweetList)
